definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The two most common types of igneous rocks are granite and basalt.
sentences.chinese: 两种最普遍的火成岩是花岗岩和玄武岩。

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩粉碎，采煤，硅酸盐矿石内植入矿物。

sentences.english: Wooing the Granite State is fiendishly hard.
sentences.chinese: 要赢得“花岗岩州”有如过刀山下火海。

sentences.english: The Longyan kaolin deposit in Fujian province, is of weathering residual type of altered granite.
sentences.chinese: 福建龙岩高岭土矿床是蚀变花岗岩风化残余型矿床。

sentences.english: Late Carboniferous granite in the Xiao Hinggan Mountains shows magma-mixing characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 小兴安岭晚石炭世花岗岩具有明显的岩浆混合特征。

sentences.english: Irruptive rock body reservoir is one of important volcanic rock reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 在火成岩系列中最常见的侵入体是花岗岩。

sentences.english: Massive, granite rock formations overlook beautiful, white-sand beaches.
sentences.chinese: 庞大的花岗岩阵列俯瞰美丽的白色沙滩。
花岗岩是金矿的有利赋矿围岩。

sentences.english: The ore district is located in the inside and outside contact strips of Dayang granite body.
sentences.chinese: 矿区处于大洋花岗岩体的内外接触带。

sentences.english: The information of the tectonic geochemistry displays that the Pingdao granite is a intraplate rift type.
sentences.chinese: 构造地球化学信息显示岩体是大陆裂谷型花岗岩。

sentences.english: The vitrified soil, as hard as granite, can be used for landfill.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃化的土壤类似坚硬的花岗岩，可以用于填埋。

sentences.english: Relative LREE enrichment can be seen in the soils derived from sandstones, granites and shales.
sentences.chinese: 砂岩和花岗岩上发育的土壤中LREE相对富集。

sentences.english: The Malage tin-polymetal deposit is distributed near the southeast lateral of the Baipaotai granite.
sentences.chinese: 马拉格矿床分布于白炮台花岗岩的南东侧。

sentences.english: Metasomatism of the granitic rocks in Zhejiang Province, China is investigated by petrography.
sentences.chinese: 用岩相学方法研究浙江花岗岩的交代作用。

sentences.english: The Baozhu Mountain granite body is a complex rock body.
sentences.chinese: 薄竹山花岗岩体是一个复式岩体。

sentences.english: The Naqing landside that is middle-sized hillside landslide has developed on the granite area.
sentences.chinese: 那勤滑坡发育在花岗岩区，属中型山体滑坡。
